      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws IOException
        Entry point for command line invocation of the JavaCode Script Engine.
        Parameters:
        args - - command line options.
        Throws:
        IOException - When the source file cannot be read or closed.
        ScriptException - When the script contains errors.

      • loadScript

        public String loadScript(Reader reader)
                  throws ScriptException
        Load a Java source script into a string, skip shebang, when present.
        Specified by:
        loadScript in interface ScriptReader
        Parameters:
        reader - An I/O Reader bound to a Java source script.
        Returns:
        A string containing the source script.
        Throws:
        ScriptException - When the source cannot be loaded.
        See Also:
        org.patrodyne.scripting.java.ScriptReader#readScript(java.io.Reader)
